short_description.en: Up to $840 off a qualifying Energy Star certified heat pump clothes dryer for income-qualified residents.
Up to $840 off a qualifying Energy Star certified electric or induction cooktop, stove, range, or oven, for income-qualified residents.
Up to $1,600 coupon off qualifying insulation products for income-qualified residents via Home Electrification and Appliance Rebates (HEAR) program.
Up to $175/ton rebate for qualified ducted or ductless air-source heat pumps less than 5.4 tons.
$700/unit rebate for qualified ground source heat pumps.
$300/unit rebate on ENERGY STAR certified heat pump water heaters less than 55 gallons.
$50 rebate on an qualified Energy Star smart thermostat for homes with refrigerated air conditioning.
$50 rebate on an Energy Star induction cooktop.

Up to $0.239/CFM50 rebate on air sealing. Rebate amount dependent upon home heating and AC type
(gas, electric resistance, heat pump).
Up to $200/kW + $0.19/kWh rebate on duct sealing based on kW and kWh savings.
Up to $1.05/sqft rebate for ceiling insulation. Amount determined by new and existing R-Value, heat type.
Up to $0.30/sqft rebate for qualified floor insulation. Amount determined by home type and heat type.
Up to a $500 rebate on the purchase of a qualified EV charger plus up to $1,500 in installation assistance.
Up to a $750 rebate on the purchase of a qualified EV charger plus up to $3,500 in installation assistance, for income-qualified households.
Free in-home Energy Check Up or virtual video call appointment. Required first step for Check Up program equipment rebates. Not a full energy audit.
$200 rebate on eligible advanced window evaporative coolers.
$500 rebate on a qualifying Energy Star heat pump water heater.
Receive an $50 instant rebate on an eligible Thermostat Rewards device at the Xcel Energy Store.
Receive a one-time $100 enrollment bill credit for signing up for Thermostat Rewards program with an existing eligible thermostat with central AC.
Up to $3,000 refundable tax credit for new, leased or used electric vehicle.
Up to $400 refundable tax credit to install a level 1 or level 2 EV charger at home.
Up to $0.20/sqft rebate for cool roof products, dependent on home cooling type.
$1.00/Sqft rebate for solar screens on West and South facing single-pane windows. Must be rated to block minimum 80% of solar heat.
Up to $3.00/window sqft rebate for ENERGY STAR windows, dependent on home cooling type.
$600 rebate for an eligible permanently installed evaporative cooling unit.
$1,000 tax credit for an Energy Star certified air source heat pump including installation.
$2,000 refundable tax credit for an Energy Star certified air source heat pump installation, for income-qualified residents.
$2,000 refundable tax credit for an Energy Star rated ground source heat pump installation, for income-qualified residents.
$1,000 tax credit for an Energy Star rated ground source heat pump.
100% of cost up to $1,000 refundable tax credit for Energy Star rated windows and doors, per product installed. For income-qualified residents.
50% of cost up to $500 tax credit for Energy Star rated windows and doors, per product installed.
100% of cost up to $2,000 refundable tax credit for insulation improvements, per product installed. For income-qualified residents.
50% of cost up to $1,000 tax credit for insulation improvements, per product installed.
$700 refundable tax credit for an Energy Star rated heat pump water heater installs, for income-qualified residents.
$350 tax credit for an Energy Star rated heat pump water heater including installation costs.
$1,000 refundable tax credit for an electric vehicle charger product and installation costs, for income-qualified residents.
$500 tax credit for an electric vehicle charger product and installation costs.
10% of cost of installing home solar, up to $6,000 refundable tax credit.
$165 rebate for a qualifying Energy Star heat pump clothes dryer. On-line or mail-in rebate.
$110 rebate for qualifying Energy Star electric clothes dryers. Online/mail in rebates. Can be stacked with Home Energy Checkup rebates.
$200 rebate for eligible Energy Star induction cooktops and ranges.
$50 rebate on select Energy Star smart thermostats.
$300 rebate for an Energy Star certified heat pump water heater that is 50 gallons or larger. Home Checkup in prior 10 years.
$550 rebate for a qualifying mini-split air source heat pump replacing refrigerated system by participating installer. Home Checkup in prior 10 yrs.
$550 rebate for qualifying ducted air source heat pump replacing refrigerated air, installed by participating installer. Home Checkup in prior 10 yrs.
5%-10% for qualified attic/roof insulation improvements, by participating contractor, up to $200 depending on cooling type. Prior Home Energy Checkup.
Up to $2,500/ton rebate for qualified ground source heat pump systems.
$175/ton rebate for qualified air source heat pump systems. Minimum SEER 16 and HSPF 8.5. Includes manufactured homes on permanent foundation.
Free home energy audit for residential customers.
$500/ton for new ground-source electric heat pump. $250/ton for replacement units. $100/unit for ground-source heat pump powered hot water.
$90 rebate for ENERGY STAR ventless hybrid heat pump clothes dryer. $30 rebate for ENERGY STAR electric dryer.
25% rebate off cost of new e-bike up to $150. 50% off the cost of extra battery up to $25 purchased with e-bike.
25% rebate of cost up to $150 for snowblower and walk-behind mowers, $50 for trimmer, leaf blower and power washer, and $100 for chainsaws.
25% rebate of cost up to $1000 for electric riding mower
$200 rebate for evaporative cooler. Minimum 2,500 CFM. Window and portable units are not eligible. Two rebates per account.
50% rebate up to $125 for labor and $125 for a Level 2 charger.  For managed charger, maximums are $500 for labor and $500 for charger.
Up to $16/kW for electric thermal storage and slab units controlled by timers or master control system.
50% rebate on qualified ducted air-source heat pump larger than 1.5 tons, up to $1,500.  Up to $500 for smaller system. $500 propane back-up bonus.
50% of equipment cost up to $500/ton rebate for air-to-water heat pump radiant systems
$350 rebate for switching to induction cooktop/range from gas or propane or install in new construction.  Cooktop must be at least 30" wide.
$50 rebate per ENERGY STAR thermostat if enrolled in managed demand/response or time of use program.  $25/thermostat if not.
$350 rebate for qualified ENERGY STAR heat pump water heater (30-55 gallon capacity)
$100 rebate for new or replacement whole house fan.  Limit 2 per member account.
$500/ton off new ground source heat pump.  $250/ton for replacement unit. $100 rebate for desuperheater ground source heat pump powered hot water.
50% rebate up to $1,500 for qualified air source heat pump bigger than 1.5 tons. $500 for smaller systems.  $500 propane backup bonus for ducted.
$500/ton for air to water heat pump systems
$200 rebate for evaporator cooler with minimum flow rate of 2,500 CFM. Limit two per member account.
25% rebate up to $150 for e-bike plus 50% extra battery cost up to $25 with bike purchase. $300/account limit for outdoor rebates.
25% of cost rebate up to $150 for snowblower and walk-behind mowers, $50 for trimmer, leaf blower and power washer, and $100 for chainsaws.
25% rebate off the cost up of riding mower to $1000
$350 rebate for induction cooktop when replacing gas or propane. Cooktop minimum width of 30 inches.
$90 rebate for ENERGY STAR heat pump (ventless) clothes dryer. $100 rebate for electric clothes dryer.
$25 rebate/ENERGY STAR smart thermostat, $50/thermostat in managed program. Limit 2 for standard low-voltage. Limit 5 for  line-voltage applications.
$500/ton for air-to-water heat pump, not to exceed 50% of equipment cost.
$350 rebate for a new induction cooktop (minimum 30" width) when replacing gas or propane.
$500/ton rebate for ground source heat pump and $250/ton for replacement systems. Not to exceed 50% of equipment cost. $100 extra for desuperheater.
$200 rebate per evaporative cooler with at least 2,500 cubic feet/meter output. Limit 2. No window or portable units.
$25 rebate/Energy Star smart thermostat, $50/thermostat in managed program.  Limit 2 for standard low-voltage. Limit 5 for line voltage thermostats.
50% equipment cost up to $1,500 for qualified ducted air source heat pump > than 1.5 tons. Up to $500 for smaller systems. $500 propane backup bonus.
$100 rebate for whole house fan. Limit 2 per member account. Attic ventilation systems do not qualify.
$75 rebate for Energy Star electric clothes dryer. Extra $30 Tri-State rebate may be available for qualified dryer.
25% rebate of cost up to $100 for Learning thermostat.  Maximum limit for all rebates per year per member account.
$25 rebate/Energy Star smart thermostat. $50 rebate/thermostat if in a managed program. Limit 2 for low-voltage, limit 5 for line voltage application.
25% rebate of material costs for qualified ENERGY STAR windows and doors. Maximum yearly rebate limits.
30% rebate of material costs of upgraded or added insulation qualified for your climate zone. Maximum yearly rebate limits.
50% rebate for caulking and weather-stripping materials. Maximum yearly rebate limits.
$2,000/unit rebate for closed loop geothermal heat pump.  Maximum yearly rebate limits.
$500/ton for new ground source heat pump; $250/ton for replacement, up to 50% of equipment cost. AHRI certificate required. Tri-state rebate.
$1,000/unit for qualified ducted air source heat pump; $500/indoor mini-split unit. At least 16 SEER. Max yearly rebate limit.
50% cost up to $1,500 of air source heat pump > than 1.5 tons. Up to $500 for smaller systems. $500 extra for ducted propane backup. Tri-State rebate.
25% of cost up to $150 for snowblower, walk-behind mower; $100 for chainsaws; $50 for trimmer, leaf blower, power washer.  50% extra battery to $25.
25% of cost rebate for electric riding mower up to $1,000. 50% of cost for extra battery up to $25. Maximum rebate limits.
$125 rebate for electric water heater (UEF 93% or higher). Maximum limit for all rebates over 12 months.
$350 Tri-State rebate for Energy Star heat pump water heater. There is a maximum limit for all rebates over 12 months.
$50 Tri-state rebate for electric water heater if replacing propane/gas, 50/unit for managed, $30/unit new construction. 30 gallon minimum.
$500 rebate for Energy Star heat pump water heater (HP setting only). Maximum annual limit for all rebates.
Free basic home energy audit (not an extensive building professional audit)
Free Level 2 electric vehicle charger from OCEC.
50% of cost of Level 2 charger up to $125 labor and $125 product. Up to $500 labor and $500 product for a managed charger. Total rebate limit/year.
$90 rebate for Energy Star heat pump (ventless) clothes dryer.
$350 rebate for induction cooktop (minimum width 30") if switch from gas or propane or put in new construction.
$25 rebate for smart thermostat. $50 rebate if enrolled in managed program. Limit 2 for standard/low-voltage applications. Limit 5 for line-voltage.
$200 rebate for permanent evaporative cooling (minimum airflow of 2,500 CFM). Limit 2 per member account. Replacement or new.
$50 rebate for electric water heater if replacing propane/gas, $50/unit for managed/demand-response or $30/unit new construction. 30 gallon or larger.
$350 rebate for Energy Star air source heat pump water heater (30 gal. minimum)
$16/kW for electric thermal storage units and $12/kW for thermal slabs controlled by timers or master control systems. Min. load for ETS is 1kW.
50% of Level 2 cost up to $125 for EV charger and $125 for labor. If managed system, the rebate is 50% of cost up to $500 for charger/$500 for labor.
$500/ton for air-to-water heat pump e.g., for radiant floors) up to 50% of equipment cost. AHRI certificate required.
$1,500 for qualified air source heat pumps greater than 1.5 tons. $500 for smaller systems. Max rebate: 50% equipment cost. $500 for propane back-up.
$500/ton for new ground source heat pumps. $250 for replacements. AHRI certificate required.
25% of cost rebate up to $150 for e-bike plus 50% of cost of extra battery up to $25 at time of bike purchase. $300 max outdoor equipment rebate/yr.
25% of cost up to $1000 for riding mower.  50% cost up to $25 for extra battery bought at time of mower purchase.
25% cost up to $150 for electric snowblower, walk-behind mower; $50 for trimmer, blower, power washer; $100 for chainsaw. 50% ($25 max) extra battery
$100 rebate for whole house fan. Limit 2 per member account. New or replacement.
$30 rebate for Energy Star electric resistance clothes dryer.
$350 rebate to switch from gas/propane stove to induction cooktop/range at least 30" wide. $350 for induction in new construction.
$200 rebate per evaporative cooler with minimum airflow of 2,500 CFM. Limit 2 per member account. New or replacement.
$350 rebate per qualified Energy Star air source heat pump water heater (30 gallon or larger).
Electric resistance water heater rebates: $50/unit to replace propane/gas, $50/unit for managed or $30/unit new construction. 30 gallon or larger.
$16/kW rebate for controlled off-peak electric thermal storage and slab and $12/kW for controlled off-peak thermal slab.  Minimum load is 1 kW.
$500/ton for a new ground source heat pump system and $250/ton for replacement units. $100/unit for desuperheater (hot water).
$500/ton rebate for air-to-water radiant systems up to 50% of equipment cost.
50% rebate up to $1,500 for qualified air source heat pump greater than 1.5 tons. $500 maximum for smaller systems. Ducted propane backup, $500 bonus.
$100 rebate to switch from electric stove to induction cooktop/range that is at least 30" wide.
$100 rebate for induction cooktop/range (at least 30" wide) if you switch from an electric stove.
$100 rebate for switching to induction cooktop/range from electric. Cooktop must be at least 30" wide.
$100 rebate for induction cooktop when replacing electric stove. Cooktop must be at least 30" wide.
$100 rebate for a new induction cooktop (minimum 30" width) when replacing an electric stove.
$25 rebate per Energy Star smart thermostat. Limit 2 for standard installation, limit 5 for line-voltage applications.
50% rebate up to $1,500 for qualified air source cold climate heat pump mini-splits greater than 1.5 tons.  Up to $500 for smaller systems.
$50 rebate for electric water heater replacing propane/gas, $50/unit for managed/demand-response or $30/unit new construction. 30 gallons or larger.
50% of Level 2 charger cost up to $125 labor and $125 charger. If charger is in managed program, charger rebate is 50% up to $500 labor/$500 charger.
25% of cost up to $1,000 for an electric riding mower.
25% of cost up to $150 for an e-bike. Up to $25 for extra battery at time of bike purchase. $300 outdoor equipment rebate limit per year.
25% cost up to $150 for electric snowblower, walk-behind mower; $50 for trimmer, blower, power washer; $100 for chainsaw. $25 max for extra battery.
Up to $250 rebate for professional home energy audit
$50/kW for ETS heater controlled by timers or master control system. Separate rebates for timers.
$75 rebate per ENERGY STAR smart thermostat controlling electric load.  $25 per programmable thermostat or time.
$350 rebate to switch to an induction cooktop/range (minimum 30" width) from gas or $100 rebate replacing electric. $350/unit new construction.
25% of cost of ebike up to $150.
25% rebate of cost up to $250 of electric two-stage snowblower and up to $150 for single stage snowblower.
25% rebate off cost of electric riding mower up to $1000.
25% rebate off cost of walk behind electric mower up to $150.
25% rebate off cost of electric chainsaw + battery up to $100.
$90 rebate per ENERGY STAR heat pump dryer.
$700 rebate for a ENERGY STAR heat pump water heater, minimum 30 gallons capacity.
$50 for electric-resistance water heater if switching from propane/gas or if managed through wi-fi enabled smart thermostat or timer on Time of Use.
$500/ton rebate for ducted/ductless air source heat pump (minimum HSPF2 8.5). $250 extra for weatherization. $500 propane bonus.
$500/ton rebate for air-to-water heat pump (minimum HSPF2 8.5). $250 extra for weatherization.
$500/ton rebate for new ground source heat pump (minimum 3/4 ton). $250/ton for replacement.  Extra $250 for weatherization.
Up to $1,000 to install electric vehicle charger. Rebate is 100% of charger cost up to $500 and 50% of plug installation cost up to $500.
$90 rebate for Energy Star heat pump (ventless) clothes dryer.
$350/unit for induction cooktop replacing propane/natural gas or new construction. 30" width minimum.
$100/unit for induction cooktop replacing electric. 30" width minimum.
25% of cost up to $150 for walk-behind mower, $100 for chainsaw, $50 for trimmer, pruner, leaf blowers, power washer.  Up to $25 for extra battery.
25% of cost up to $1,000 for electric riding mower.
25% of cost up to $250 for 2-stage snow blower and $150 for 1-stage snow blower. 50% of cost up to $25 for extra battery at time of blower purchase.
25% of cost up to $150 for ebike. 50% of cost of extra battery up to $25 at time of bike purchase.
$16/kW for controlled off-peak heating electric thermal storage; $12/kW controlled off-peak thermal slab unit. Minimum load 1 kW.
50% rebate up to $1,500 for qualified mini-split systems greater than 1.5 tons. Up to $500 for smaller eligible  systems.
50% of equipment cost up to $500/ton for air-to-water radiant systems.
50% rebate up to $1,500 for qualified heat pump systems greater than 1.5 tons. $500 maximum for smaller systems. $500 bonus for ducted propane backup.
$250 account credit for qualified Level 2 EV charger.
Up to $1,500 in matching funds for energy-efficient upgrades including heat pumps (16 SEER+), smart water heaters, insulation, thermostats and more.
$35 annual bill credit for signing up for an off-peak electric vehicle charging schedule with eligible charger.
Up to $400 rebate on eligible large advanced evaporative coolers.
$80 rebate per Energy Star certified windows.
$300 for qualified Energy Star variable speed pool pump.
$50 rebate for smart thermostat through the PNM Midstream Program. Incentive availability subject to change due to program funding.
Up to $4,000 rebate for purchasing or leasing an electric vehicle for income qualified customers from participating dealers.
$1,000 rebate on electric bike for income qualified customers from participating dealers.
Up to $300 rebate/unit for new qualifying Energy Star pool pump.
Up to $150/unit rebate on qualified central air-conditioners less than 5.4 tons.
$350/unit rebate for switching from gas to induction cooktop/range or new construction. 30 inch minimum width. Energy Star required.
$100/unit rebate for electric-to-induction cooktop/range switch. 30 inch minimum width. Energy Star required.
Up to $70/unit rebate for Energy Star electric water heater. $50/unit for new construction.
$60 rebate for Energy Star electric clothes dryer
Purchase a 40 gallon or 50 gallon electric water heater for $50 or $60 respectively.
10% rebate of material costs for insulated concrete forms used in home construction. Maximum yearly rebate limits.
$30 rebate for Energy Star electric resistance dryer.
Free test drive of Chevy Bolt EV and free Level 2 EV charging at LCEC main office in Lovington, NM.
Up to 50% upfront discount on Marathon electric water heater. Purchase price is LCEC's cost +10% markup - $5/gallon rebate.
Free home energy audit including visual inspection of thermal qualities of home.
60% upfront discount on Marathon electric water heater. 30, 40 or 50 gallon sizes.
Induction Cooktop Loaner Program - try out an induction cooktop, utensils, pan and instructions for free. Borrow from local libraries.
Reduce Energy Costs: Guidance for DIY energy audit and borrow Kill-A-Watt meter or a thermal imaging camera from public library.
Free home energy audit. Repeat audits are $500.
$50 credit on electric bill for qualified electric heat heater timer when you participate in the Residential Time of Use Plan.
Provides energy-saving retrofits and home modifications at no charge to eligible low-income homeowners and renters.
Provides energy-saving retrofits and home modifications at no charge to eligible low-income homeowners and renters.
One-time grant up to $50,000 for envelope, efficiency  and safety improvements to qualified homeowners in unincorporated parts of Santa Fe County.
Affordable electric carshare. First test drive is free. Subsequent rentals are $4-$5/hr or a $35-50/day. Specific locations. Las Cruces summer 2025.
Provides no-cost energy efficiency services to income-qualified customers in all residential home types. Multifamily and rental may qualify.
50% rebate up to $900 for qualifying e-bike for qualified residential accounts.
70% rebate up to $1,300 for qualifying e-bike for income qualified cuistomers.
$4,000 rebate off qualifying electric vehicle (with an MSRP below $55,000), offered only to low-income customers.
Up to $1,300 for installation of 240V dedicated EV charging outlet. Up to $2,500 extra if panel upgrade is required. Must join EV Smart Rewards NM.
Up to $1,800 for installation of dedicated 240V EV charger outlet. Up to $2,500 extra available if a panel upgrade is required.
Up to $500 rebate for qualifying smart Level 2 charging station for eligible customers. Enroll in EV Smart Rewards NM or Whole House EV Program.
Up to $600 rebate for qualifying smart Level 2 charging station for income qualifying customers.
Up to $75 rebate on qualified smart thermostat plus $25/year in Energy Wise Savings program.  Get $50 + $25/yr to enroll existing thermostat.
Up to $860 off the cost of a qualified heat pump depending on efficiency rating, subject to PNM Midstream program funding availability.
Up to $650 off the cost of a qualified heat pump water heater depending on efficiency rating and size. Subject to program funding availability.
Up to $310 off a qualified central refrigerated air conditioner depending on efficiency rating. Subject to Midstream Program funding availability.
Up to $16,000 worth of energy retrofits for income qualifying homeowners in unincorporated parts of Santa Fe County.
Up to $750 rebate on qualified heat pump using participating contractor, depending on efficiency rating. $500 bonus to replace central electric heat.
Up to $325 rebate on qualified air source heat pump in new construction using participating contractor.  Rebate depends on efficiency rating.
Up to $190 rebate on qualified ductless heat pump, depending on efficiency and using participating contractor.
$700 or $200 rebate on eligible evaporative cooling unit, depending on media saturation rating. Most units with 8" pads don't qualify for $700 rebate.
Up to $200 rebate on qualified central air conditioner using participating contractor. Rebate depends on efficiency rating.
Free energy audit and energy-saving measures such as sealing leaks with approved contractors.  Additional efficiency services at reduced prices.
Up to $500 rebate for Level 2 electric vehicle charger or installation cost (240 volt circuit). Renters- separate meter and written landlord consent.
Up to $2,500 rebate for qualified Level 2 electric vehicle charger installation, income-qualified residents.  Renters-separate meter, written consent.
Rent a Level 2 EV charger for $12/month if you have Wi-Fi and charge off-peak through "Optimize Your Charge" program.
$500/ton for new installation, $250/ton for replacement units, $100/unit for ground source heat pump powered hot water (desuperheater).
$100/unit for Energy Star split-system air conditioner. Minimum size is 1 ton and 16  SEER minimum.
No-cost energy audit and efficiency upgrades to income-qualified households. Upgrades depend on grant funds availability. Community solar enrollment.
$50 rebate for installation of smart thermostat, $25 rebate for programmable thermostat.
$300 rebate to install or upgrade attic insulation from R-11 or lower to R-30 or higher.
No-cost weatherization including duct sealing, air sealing, caulking, water heater jacket, thermostat for income-eligible households.
Up to $1,000 rebate for installation of qualified insulation in attic, roof or crawl space by a participating contractor.
Up to $200 rebate for duct sealing  by a participating contractor.
Up to $200 rebate for sealing air leaks by a participating contractor.
$50 instant rebate for ENERGY STAR smart thermostat at Lowes or The Home Depots or via contractor. $50 rebate after purchase at other retailers.
$25 rebate for qualified Energy Star smart thermostat.
$90/unit rebate for heat pump clothes dryer.
$30/unit rebate for electric clothes dryer.
$90/unit rebate for an Energy Star heat pump clothes dryer. $30 rebate for Energy Star electric clothes dryer.
50% of the product and installation cost of a Level 2 electric vehicle charger up to $250.
50% equipment cost up to $1,500 for qualified ductless Energy Star air source heat pumps greater than 1.5 tons. Up to $500 for smaller systems.
25% of the cost up of an e-bike to $150. 50% of cost up to $25 for additional battery with original purchase.
25% of the cost of an electric ride-on lawn mower up $1,000. 50% of cost up to $25 for additional battery with original purchase.
25% of cost up to $250 for electric walk behind 2-stage mower. Up to $150 for 1-stage mower. Extra battery at time of purchase 50% rebate up to $25.
25% of cost up to $100 for chain saw; $50 for trimmer, pruner, power washer, or leaf blower. Extra battery at time of purchase - 50% rebate up to $25.
50% rebate on qualified ducted air-source heat pump larger than 1.5 tons, up to $1,500.  Up to $500 for smaller system.
Up to $2,500 refundable tax credit for used electric vehicle.  Credit amount steps down through 2029.
Free energy use analysis.
$50 rebate on select Energy Star smart thermostats installed after a PNM Home Energy Checkup.
$250 rebate for early retirement of central air conditioner with eligible replacement by participating contractor.  Home Checkup in prior 10 years.
$75 rebate for early replacement of 2014 or older clothes dryer with a new qualified Energy Star model.  Previous Home Energy Checkup required.
$50 rebate for an A/C Tune-up by participating contractor. Prior Home Energy Checkup required.
$165 rebate for a qualifying Energy Star heat pump clothes dryer. Instant coupon to use in-store or online at retailer.
$110 rebate for qualifying Energy Star electric clothes dryers. Instant coupon for online or in-store purchase at retailer.
$400 rebate on eligible large advanced evaporative cooler. Instant coupon for on-line or in-store participating retailer.
$50 instant coupon for on-line or in-store purchase of select Energy Star smart thermostats at participating retailers.
Up to $700 instant coupon for on-line or in-store purchase of eligible heat pump hot waters at participating retailers.
$4,000 rebate off pre-owned qualifying electric vehicle, offered only to low-income customers.
$250 point-of-sale rebate on electric bike from participating dealers.
Up to $1,500 in matching funds for energy-efficient upgrades including heat pumps (16 SEER+), smart water heaters, insulation, thermostats and more.
Up to $1,500 in matching funds for energy-efficient upgrades including heat pumps (16 SEER+), smart water heaters, insulation, thermostats and more.
